name: Little Planet: the early years.
description:
Once upon a time, in a star field just around the corner....

Little Planet wants to grow. Can you help him catch all the things he need? catch water to build an atmosphere, carbon and a little spark to kickstart your life. DNA, not alien of course, to get new species on your planet. Just don't run into an asteroid, and try not to end up with bugs like uncle Earth.

Controls: use your arrow keys to fly up and down, plain and simple. don't hit asteroids, they will kill your little rock.

program made in Construct 2.

all programming, drawing of components and red letter fonts are done by myself. sounds are taken royalty free from soundbible. sounds by GlorySunz, Mike Koenig and Mark Mattingly.
